```{python}
import pandas as pd, json

cols = ["MATCH UP", "GAME DATE", "W/L"]
data = pd.read_csv("Lakers2009-2021.csv", usecols = cols)
print(data.head())

data.rename(columns = {
    'MATCH\xa0UP' : 'Match_Up',
    'GAME\xa0DATE' : 'Game_Date'
}, inplace=True)

def home_away(x):
    x = x.strip().lower()
    if "vs." in x:
        return "Home"
    elif "@" in x: 
        return "Away"

data["Home/Away"] = data["Match_Up"].apply(home_away)

print(data.head())
```
